properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Chincoteague to Parramore Island VA out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Fenwick Island DE to Chincoteague VA out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 23 at 3:25PM EST until January 25 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...East then southeast winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to
30 kt late Friday into Saturday morning, then south around 15 kt
becoming southwest late Saturday morning through Saturday
afternoon. Seas 5 to 9 ft expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Fenwick Island DE to Chincoteague
VA out 20 nm and Coastal waters from Chincoteague to Parramore
Island VA out 20 nm.

* WHEN...From 4 PM Friday to 4 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM FRIDAY TO 4 PM EST SATURDAY
